published-with: Published with GitHub Pages, view the source on GitHub.
title: Title
author: Author
nightly-desc: Commit/beta builds, potentially unstable but have the latest updates
home-1: Here you can find lists of 3DS and DS homebrew, updated regularly to make sure you're getting the latest versions. Click on the links in the navigation bar at the top to get full lists, or check out some of the most recently updated at the bottom of this page!
home-2: Most information on this site is automatically gathered from the information on the app's GitHub repository, however if you notice any incorrect information please report it as a GitHub Issue or on our Discord server. Thanks!
home-3: This is also the default UniStore for Universal-Updater, so if you'd like to browse and install apps from Universal-DB directly on your 3DS you should give it a try.
